messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to an investigator if they fail a Sanity roll during a reality check?
They lose 1 Sanity point, which can immediately induce a bout of madness if they are suffering underlying insanity.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to an investigator if they succeed on a Sanity roll during a reality check?
They see through any delusions, and the Keeper must describe what the investigator genuinely perceives.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who usually calls for reality checks in the Call of Cthulhu game?
Insane investigators, although players might call for one if they wish to 'see through' a hallucination or illusion.

What is the consequence of failing a Pushed skill roll in the Call of Cthulhu game?
It results in great consequences.

What happens if an investigator is suffering from underlying insanity?
This will immediately induce a bout of madness.

What does an investigator see when they make a successful reality check roll?
Things as they really are.

What skill allows an insane investigator to see a delusion for what it is?
Psychoanalysis skill.

Within seconds.

Palpitations, trembling, choking, and uncontrollable anxiety.

What are some symptoms of a character with mania?
A general increase in activity, garrulousness, increased self-esteem to the point of delusion, decreased need for sleep, easily distracted, willingness for dangerous or imprudent activities.
